trans-unit.source: Initiates an asynchronous operation to open a stream for writing to the blob.
trans-unit.target: Initiates an asynchronous operation to open a stream for writing to the blob.

trans-unit.source: The size of the page blob, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: The size of the page blob, in bytes.

trans-unit.source: The size must be a multiple of 512.
trans-unit.target: The size must be a multiple of 512.

trans-unit.source: If <codeInline>null</codeInline>, the page blob must already exist.
trans-unit.target: If <codeInline>null</codeInline>, the page blob must already exist.

trans-unit.source: A <codeEntityReference>T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1</codeEntityReference> object of type <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Blob.CloudBlobStream</codeEntityReference> that represents the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: A <codeEntityReference>T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1</codeEntityReference> object of type <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Blob.CloudBlobStream</codeEntityReference> that represents the asynchronous operation.

trans-unit.source: Note that this method always makes a call to the <codeEntityReference>M:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Blob.CloudPageBlob.FetchAttributesAsync(Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.AccessCondition,Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Blob.BlobRequestOptions,Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.OperationContext,System.Threading.CancellationToken)</codeEntityReference> method under the covers.
trans-unit.target: Note that this method always makes a call to the <codeEntityReference>M:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Blob.CloudPageBlob.FetchAttributesAsync(Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.AccessCondition,Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Blob.BlobRequestOptions,Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.OperationContext,System.Threading.CancellationToken)</codeEntityReference> method under the covers.

trans-unit.source: Set the <codeEntityReference>P:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Blob.CloudPageBlob.StreamWriteSizeInBytes</codeEntityReference> property before calling this method to specify the block size to write, in bytes, ranging from between 16 KB and 4 MB inclusive.
trans-unit.target: Set the <codeEntityReference>P:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Blob.CloudPageBlob.StreamWriteSizeInBytes</codeEntityReference> property before calling this method to specify the block size to write, in bytes, ranging from between 16 KB and 4 MB inclusive.
